aster_geode_valley.description: They glow like a star, they bloom like a flower.
aster_geode_valley.condition: Interact with Aster in Geode Valley

ballpit_playhouse.name: Kaleidoscope of Youth
ballpit_playhouse.description: Colors as far as the eye can see...

night_desolate_landscape.name: Coldest Moon
night_desolate_landscape.description: This coldness is eating me alive
night_desolate_landscape.condition: Reach the night landscape area in Desolate Snowscape

big_fish_dreary_harbor.name: Big Blub
big_fish_dreary_harbor.condition: Find the giant fish in Dreary Harbor

w_girl_duality_winds.name: Familiar Place, Familiar Someone
w_girl_duality_winds.description: Wait a second... have I seen you before?
w_girl_duality_winds.condition: Interact with the monochrome girl in the white side of Duality Winds

skate_mask_stereo_station.name: Pro Dreamer
skate_mask_stereo_station.description: I won't quit dreaming until I am physically unable.
skate_mask_stereo_station.condition: Equip the Skateboard mask in Stereo Station

monochrome_olympus_ruins.name: Void Behind the Ruins
monochrome_olympus_ruins.condition: Reach the monochrome passage in Olympus Ruins

forgotten_station.name: Last Train Home
forgotten_station.description: Just leaving town, but I really want tonight to last forever.

rune_jade_dunes.name: Jade-colored Mirage
rune_jade_dunes.description: Was that warp rune just a mirage, or did it really exist?
rune_jade_dunes.condition: Interact with the jade rune in Jade Dunes

pink_house_pastel_dream_sea.name: Ocean Secret House
pink_house_pastel_dream_sea.condition: Reach the pink house in the Sargat Layer of Pastel Dream Sea

city_of_revival_main.name: The City that Revives You
city_of_revival_main.description: A fresh take at the future of cities, maybe?
city_of_revival_main.condition: Visit the main area of City of Revival

secret_room_secret_society.name: An Eternal Cycle of Death and Birth
secret_room_secret_society.description: So that is where they all come from!
secret_room_secret_society.condition: Reach the clone room in Secret Society

shark_glacier_island.name: Sharky Ice
shark_glacier_island.description: You found the shark sandwich!... maybe.
shark_glacier_island.condition: Find the frozen shark in Glacier Island

photoreal_fused_faces_world.name: Agony
photoreal_fused_faces_world.description: The pain of having a thousand thoughts all at once, it never stops...
photoreal_fused_faces_world.condition: Trigger the Photorealistic Event in Fused Faces World

window_room.name: Lonely Windows
window_room.description: Just gazing out a little bit...

silver_girl_crossing_archipelago.name: She of Silver
silver_girl_crossing_archipelago.description: She waits beyond the crossing gate.
silver_girl_crossing_archipelago.condition: Equip the Cake effect near the silver-haired girl in Crossing Archipelago

green_tower.name: So Green
green_tower.description: Where do these stairs lead to?

2kki_menu_105.name: Garden Festival of Us!
2kki_menu_105.description: Where petals dance and smiles bloom!
2kki_menu_105.condition: Obtain the menu type 105. If you have already unlocked it, return to Garden Festival.

invisible_effect.name: Yukata's Maze
invisible_effect.description: Now you see Uro, now you don't.
invisible_effect.condition: Obtain the Invisible effect. If you have already unlocked it, return where it can be found in the Invisible Maze.

worker_the_clocktower.name: A Rigid Heartbeat Driven by Machinery
worker_the_clocktower.description: On the opposite side of a prosperous world lies a dark, lawless, and cruel reality.
worker_the_clocktower.condition: Find the sleepy worker in The Clocktower

lantern_scorched_wasteland.name: "Overheating" Game Console
lantern_scorched_wasteland.description: Maybe get a new console... and a house.
lantern_scorched_wasteland.condition: Burn the gamer by using the Lantern effect in Scorched Wasteland

student_confection_estate.name: Don't Interrupt my Art Time!
student_confection_estate.description: My sweet art room, wrapped in sweets!
student_confection_estate.condition: See all of the reactions of the art college student in Confection Estate

bloody_white_lily_laboratory.name: The Last Dreaming
bloody_white_lily_laboratory.condition: Interact with the bloody figure in White Lily Laboratory

eyeball_bomb_effect.name: 3, 2, 1... Boom Blast!
eyeball_bomb_effect.description: Who gave the bomb that adorable eye?
eyeball_bomb_effect.condition: Obtain the Eyeball Bomb effect. If you have already unlocked it, return to Mini-Maze.

snake_water_reclamation_facility.name: Snake of the Wastewater
snake_water_reclamation_facility.description: Groovin' in the process of reclamation.
snake_water_reclamation_facility.condition: Find the snake in Water Reclamation Facility

race_seaside_circuit.name: 1-2-3-Go!
race_seaside_circuit.condition: Complete the Seaside Circuit track in less than 34 seconds

color_cubes_world.name: Ever Changing
color_cubes_world.description: So vibrant, so graceful, it's quite beautiful for a simple cube.

black_sphere_world.name: Black Sphere
black_sphere_world.description: Just a black sphere, in a vast white world.

eyeball_flesh_world.name: Soaring Eyeball
eyeball_flesh_world.condition: See the flying eyeball creature cross the screen in Flesh World

red_riding_hood_effect.name: No Picking and Eating!
red_riding_hood_effect.description: They're the apples we're supposed to deliver to Grandma...
red_riding_hood_effect.condition: Obtain the Red Riding Hood effect. If you have already unlocked it, return where it can be found in the Fairy Tale Woods or in the Birch Forest.

plant_roadkill_forest.name: The Mournful Hue
plant_roadkill_forest.condition: Chainsaw the plant creature in Roadkill Forest

firework_pollution_district.name: Firework Rainfall
firework_pollution_district.description: A display of nonstop fireworks in the cityscape, I'm sure everyone is watching.
firework_pollution_district.condition: Reach the Fireworks Viewing Area in Pollution District

sunsets_room_spaceship.name: Comfy Space Travel
sunsets_room_spaceship.description: Would you dream of Earth if you slept here? Maybe Sunset knows!

bunny_cloud_astral_world.name: Soft As Can Be
bunny_cloud_astral_world.description: This one is shaped like a bunny!
bunny_cloud_astral_world.condition: Reveal the bunny cloud in Astral World

2kki_menu_80.name: Pulse of Revival
2kki_menu_80.condition: Obtain the menu type 80. If you have already unlocked it, return where it can be found in City of Revival.

yard_photographic_field.name: Strange Yard
yard_photographic_field.description: Did these creatures escape from the murals?
yard_photographic_field.condition: Reach the yard in Photographic Field

plunge_sunken_city.name: There'll Be Another Time
plunge_sunken_city.condition: Go to Atlantis from Sunken City

koala_eucalyptus_woodland.name: Sleepy Suit
koala_eucalyptus_woodland.condition: Equip the koala suit mask where it can be found in Eucalyptus Woodland

copper_cube_plains.name: (Cu)bic Plains
copper_cube_plains.description: The green worms chomped up verdigris and the red ones consumed copper(I) oxide, presumably...

girl_moonlit_pier.name: Hopeless Waiting
girl_moonlit_pier.description: In hope the moon is kind to her
girl_moonlit_pier.condition: Find the girl in Moonlit Pier

crowded_void.name: Crowded Around the Screen
crowded_void.description: Something's coming... Can you feel it?

candle_tea_ruins.name: Jumpiest Little Soldier
candle_tea_ruins.condition: Use the Lantern effect on the candle creature in Tea Ruins

panda_trap_nazca_valley.name: Let's Make It Black and White!
panda_trap_nazca_valley.description: Don't make the cute panda grumpy!
panda_trap_nazca_valley.condition: Anger the panda girl and get caught in the Panda Checkers Area of Nazca Valley

noh_girl_lively_tower.name: Peek-a-boo Behind the Noh Mask
noh_girl_lively_tower.description: Are you hiding behind a mask too?
noh_girl_lively_tower.condition: Reveal the face of the girl wearing Noh masks in Lively Tower

swamp_of_remembrance.name: A Place That Dreamed You Back

blood_challenge.name: Blood, Arteries n' Veins
blood_challenge.description: The bloodshed spilled only forms into their own dreams, leaving our blood queen to traverse through its patterns.
blood_challenge.condition: Visit the following blood related worlds: Blood Chalice Desolation, Blood Rose Canal, Blood Chamber, Flesh World, Tartaric Abyss, Hall of Flesh, Bleeding Mushroom Garden, Carnivorous Pit, Blood World, Blood Red House

glasses_effect.name: Esoteric Optics
glasses_effect.description: What enigmas await beyond these lenses?
glasses_effect.condition: Obtain the Glasses effect. If you have already unlocked it, return where it can be found in the Dark Museum.

tower_moonlight_lantern_forest.name: Look At This Tower!
tower_moonlight_lantern_forest.condition: See the cell tower in Moonlight Lantern Forest

2kki_menu_101.name: Blooms in Hope
2kki_menu_101.description: The light blooms from nature itself
2kki_menu_101.condition: Obtain the menu type 101. If you have already unlocked it, return where it can be found in Calico Forest.

vision_satellite_space_way.name: A Familiar Dreamer?
vision_satellite_space_way.description: The return of a lost girl.
vision_satellite_space_way.condition: Trigger the Vision event in Satellite Space-way

chaser_angel_palace.name: Judgement of the Angel
chaser_angel_palace.condition: Get caught by the angels in Angel Palace

live_idol_world_performance.name: Bustling Idol
live_idol_world_performance.condition: See the two performances of the idols in Live Idol World

sherbet_snowfield.name: Sweet Shimmer
sherbet_snowfield.description: The taste reminds you of a simpler time.

tooth_tricolor_room.name: Teethy Beats
tooth_tricolor_room.description: No wires on those headphones, I guess they're Bluetooth!
tooth_tricolor_room.condition: Interact with the tooth creature with headphones in Tricolor Room

2kki_candy_shoal.name: Sweetness Overload!
2kki_candy_shoal.description: You should seek dental care after this...

cactus_desert.name: Dreaming of a Summer Afternoon
cactus_desert.description: There's beauty to be found in the harshest environments.

2kki_raincoat_effect.name: Her Yellow Raincoat
2kki_raincoat_effect.condition: Obtain the Teru Teru B?zu and Red Riding Hood effects. If you have already unlocked them, return where they can be found respectively in the main part of Dark Alleys and in the Fairy Tale Woods/in the Birch Forest.
